snippet.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone PS1 Walkthrough - Part 06
snippet.description:
==The Four Curses==
Harry heads into the deeper recesses of the Dungeons and dispels the four curses and unlocking the Dungeon Portrait, before heading in the direction of the Upper Castle.

Liked this video? Click the like button to show your support!
Subscribe for more walkthroughs: http://youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=DazzlingWalkthroughs
All the latest updates on Twitter: http://twitter.com/DWalkthrus
